facts.fact_text: Eurozone retail sales fell by 0.5% month on month in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Eurozone retail sales fell by 0.5% month on month in December 2025

facts.fact_text: November retail sales were revised down to a 0.1% increase.

evidences.evidence_text: reversing a downwardly revised 0.1% increase in November

facts.fact_text: Non-food retailing sales dropped 1.2% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: The weakness was led by non-food retailing, where sales dropped 1.2%, the steepest fall since September 2023, ending a three-month run of gains.

facts.fact_text: Fuel sales were unchanged for a second consecutive month.

evidences.evidence_text: Fuel sales were unchanged for a second consecutive month

facts.fact_text: Sales of food, drinks and tobacco edged up by 0.1% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: while sales of food, drinks and tobacco edged up by 0.1%, following a 0.4% decline in November.

facts.fact_text: Retail activity contracted in France (-1.4%), Spain (-0.9%) and Italy (-0.5%) in December.

evidences.evidence_text: Among the region’s largest economies, retail activity contracted notably in France (-1.4%), Spain (-0.9%) and Italy (-0.5%)

facts.fact_text: Germany recorded a modest increase of 0.1% in retail activity in December.

evidences.evidence_text: while Germany recorded a modest increase of 0.1%.

facts.fact_text: On an annual basis, retail sales growth slowed sharply to 1.3% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: On an annual basis, retail sales growth slowed sharply to 1.3% in December, down from 2.4% in November

evidence.evidence_text: Eurozone retail sales fell by 0.5% month on month in December 2025
On an annual basis, retail sales growth slowed sharply to 1.3% in December, down from 2.4% in November and below the 1.6% consensus forecast, underscoring a loss of consumer momentum toward year-end.
